/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is teeming with cars, indicating a busy time of day. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, adding to the urban feel of the scene. In the distance, a highway overpass can be seen, further emphasizing the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the greenery of the trees lining the street. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted colors of the buildings and cars.
